spanGrp.span: Our people make a very beautiful engagement.
bizım halh güzäl čoğ güzäl eder pamolvka
They come with several people to propose to a girl.
ğızi istämäya gälerlär birğač adamınan gälerlär
Then they announce the date of engagement.
oki navahki ğız istier značit soradan onnar abyavit ederlär angi güni ki abručenya edäjahlar
Our people make an engagement in quite different way.
abručenya edändän bizım halh eder savsem airijürä
They put money atop of glasses.
eder belä značit stakannarın üstünä ğoerlär pul
They give it to a girl and a boy.
Boy’s relatives give it to a girl and boy’s relatives give it to a boy.
ğıza verer oğlanın tarafi oğlana verer ğızın tarafi
Then they give to each other rings.
